h2_title: Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: This fight is where your transformations can really shine, particularly Red Tides. Because it's a wood beast, it's easy to set it on fire with Red Tides attacks. It's also useful to be able to use the heavy attack and dash forward to catch up with it. Once you've built enough focus, perform a heavy attack in Red Ties to knock it over and set it on fire.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water-Wood_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Water-Wood Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This fight is where your transformations can really shine, particularly Red Tides. Because it's a wood beast, it's easy to set it on fire with Red Tides attacks. It's also useful to be able to use the heavy attack and dash forward to catch up with it. Once you've built enough focus, perform a heavy attack in Red Ties to knock it over and set it on fire.
